problem.markdown:
>>Capacity of a machine:<<
[x] Is its maximum possible production rate. [ ] Has four types: two short-term capacities and two long-term capacities. [x] Can be used to inform factory design. [x] Can be used to inform real-time scheduling.
[explanation] A machine’s capacity is defined as its maximum possible production rate. It has a short-term capacity of 1 when the machine is up and 0 when the machine is down--this can be used for real-time scheduling. A machine has a long-term capacity that is equivalent to efficiency on average (long-term). [explanation] <script src="/static/st.js" type="text/javascript"/>
